content: the harbor beanie is knit in the round from the bottom up all in stockinette this hat features a double folded brim that is knit down into place from the cast on round to the live stitches creating a sturdy comfortable brim knit in a light worsted weight yarn with a gauge of 5 5 sts/ 1 inch and using needle size 5 3 75mm or any size to hit gauge other great yarn options i would recommend~ cascade eco duo knit picks chroma worsted
